name: Eraser (senritsu, Droni, mutable-noise)
description:
A game jam entry for miniBeansjam 8. 

Theme is "Du solltest nicht hier sein" ("You should not be here" or "This is no place for you"). Uses eerie hand-drawn sprites and animations and an oppressive and strange atmosphere.

WASD to move, Left Mousebutton to Shoot

Made by

  • senritsu (Programming, Project Management)
  • mutable-noise (Art, Sound, Music)
  • Droni (Programming, Voice, Music)

Source available at https://github.com/senritsu/mini-beansjam-8-eraser.
